description:
Spiritual Development in the Arms of Your Guardian Angel is a course designed to get you quickly and easily talking to your Guardian Angel.

This course will teach you how your Guardian Angel can help you and how you can develop a powerful and personal relationship with your very own Angel which can provide answers to all of your life's questions.

Throughout the course you will build steadily in confidence as you become more and more familiar with your Guardian Angel and begin to create a powerful and effective relationship which you can access instantly.

You will learn about your spiritual senses, manifesting, your spiritual path and what the next steps should be in your personal life.

Spiritual Development in the Arms of Your Guardian Angel is a course suitable for anyone who wishes to establish or strengthen their relationship with their Guardian Angel and receive their own Angelic guidance and messages.
title: Spiritual Development in the Arms of Your Guardian Angel
